author: vors
body:
This is Full CLR counter-part of #1031 
### Engine and core module dlls
- [x] System.Management.Automation
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility
- [x] ~~Microsoft.WSMan.Management~~ (nuget package)
- [x] ~~Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime~~ (nuget package)
- [x] ~~Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets~~ (nuget package)
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Security
- [x] ~~Microsoft.PowerShell.GPowerShell~~ (out of scope)
- [x] ~~Microsoft.PowerShell.Editor~~ (out of scope)
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.GraphicalHost @vors #1169
- [x] ~~Microsoft.PowerShell.ISECommon~~ (out of scope)
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob @vors #1136 
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.Interop.dll @vors (nuget package in local-nuget, need to verify it)
- [x] ~~Microsoft.PowerShell.Shell32.Interop.dll~~ (not needed for now, issue #670 to track it)
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.PSReadLine
- [ ] PSEvents.dll (native resources for win-event with registration)
- [ ] pwrshmsg.dll @vors 
- [x] pwrshplugin.dll @vors #1148 
- [x] ~~pwrshsip.dll~~ (going to use inbox one)
- [x] powershell.exe
### Workflow
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Workflow.ServiceCore.dll @daxian-dbw
- [x] Modules\PSWorkflow module files #1232

```
Modules\PSWorkflow\psworkflow.psd1
Modules\PSWorkflow\psworkflow.psm1
Modules\PSWorkflow\PSWorkflow.types.ps1xml
Modules\PSWorkflowUtility\psworkflowutility.psd1
Modules\PSWorkflowUtility\psworkflowutility.psm1
```

Auto-Generated *.Activities (for workflows) @daxian-dbw
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Core.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Management.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Security.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility.Activities
- [x] Microsoft.WSMan.Management.Activities
- [x] Make Activities dlls build with Start-PSBuild @daxian-dbw
- [ ] Move Update-PowerShellActivitySource.ps1 to Github @daxian-dbw
  The ps1 file is to auto-generate the activities source code. Need to refactor this .ps1 file to make it work in Github.
### Binplacing (psd1, psm1, ps1xml, etc)
- [x] Modules\PSDiagnostics\PSDiagnostics.psd1
- [x] Modules\PSDiagnostics\PSDiagnostics.psm1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics\Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility\Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility\Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility.psm1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtils\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtils.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtils\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtils.psm1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtils\en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtilsStrings.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Host\Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security.psd1
- [x] Modules\Microsoft.WSMan.Management\Microsoft.WSMan.Management.psd1
- [x] CimCmdlets.psd1 #1232
### PackageManager #991
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.ArchiverProviders.dll
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.CoreProviders.dll
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.MsiProvider.dll
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.MsuProvider.dll
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.dll
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\Microsoft.PackageManagement.MetaProvider.PowerShell.dll

- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\PackageManagement.psd1
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\PackageProviderFunctions.psm1
- [x] Modules\PackageManagement\PackageManagement.format.ps1xml
### en-US resources :question:
- [x] en-US\AppxProvider.Resource.psd1
- [x] en-US\ArchiveResources.psd1
- [x] en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.ODataUtilsStrings.psd1
- [ ] en-US\PowerShellExecutionPolicy.adml
- [x] en-US\PSGet.Resource.psd1
- [ ] en-US\pshmsglh.dll.mui
- [ ] en-US\pwrshmsg.dll
- [ ] en-US\pwrshplugin.dll.mui
- [ ] en-US\pwrshmsg.dll.mui
- [x] ~~en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics.resources.dll~~ (embedded)

- [x] ~~en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility.resources.dll~~ (embedded)
- [x] ~~en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost.resources.dll~~ (embedded)
- [x] ~~en-US\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security.resources.dll~~ (embedded)
- [ ] ~~en-US\Microsoft.WSMan.Management.resources.dll~~ ❓ did we embedded it in nuget?
- [x] ~~en-US\System.Management.Automation.resources.dll~~
### Other modules
- [x] Modules\PSScheduledJob

```
Modules\PSScheduledJob\PSScheduledJob.psd1
Modules\PSScheduledJob\PSScheduledJob.types.ps1xml
Modules\PSScheduledJob\PSScheduledJob.Format.ps1xml
```
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts

```
Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts\1.0.0.0\Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts.dll

```
- [x] Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive

```
Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive\Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive.psd1

Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive\en-US\ArchiveResources.psd1
```
- [x] Schema\Maml*xsd #1232

comments.author: Indhukrishna
comments.body:
What about the following?
_Cmdletization modules and assemblies_
- Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.dll
- Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.dll
- Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.Unmanaged.dll
- Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets.dll
- CimCmdlets.psd1

I think this is related to _scheduled job cmdlets_. Paul Higginbotham would know for sure
- Microsoft.PowerShell.Shell32.Interop.dll

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@Indhukrishna `Microsoft.PowerShell.Shell32.Interop.dll` is a good catch, we have Cmdlets that depend on it #670

For everything else, we will do a nuget package.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
With the last merged PR #1232 our the list is reduced to the following
- [ ] PSEvents.dll
- [ ] pwrshmsg.dll
- [ ] en-US\PowerShellExecutionPolicy.adml
- [ ] en-US\pshmsglh.dll.mui
- [ ] en-US\pwrshmsg.dll
- [ ] en-US\pwrshplugin.dll.mui
- [ ] en-US\pwrshmsg.dll.mui

These assemblies are native resources assemblies.  
Building them is closely related to #1148 , because involves `mc.exe`.

I'm going to move this issue from 0.6.0 into Aug17 milestone, because the critical part of it (enable full CLR deployment to run BVT/DRT) is done.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors I added 'Update-PowerShellActivitySource.ps1' to the reduced list.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @daxian-dbw thanks. I think we need a separate issue for it, since it's not a product code really.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors I removed 'Update-PowerShellActivitySource.ps1' from the reduced list, and opened #1249 to track it.

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: The list looks good compared to binaries shipped with WMF 5.1

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Great! Thank you @raghushantha for checking it. Should we close this issue?

title: Library list for Full CLR
